projects.title: Database Management System
projects.bodyText:
- Created a database management system 
 - Parsed SQL queries, created and optimized a logical query plan to execute, created system to convert binary files into data tuples for manipulation 
 -  Executed query plan through physical operator implementations and wrote received result data back into binary file format.

projects.title: Transcription for Spoken Word Project
projects.bodyText:
- Created a speech recognition software tool for multi-word sequences from a basic English lexicon 
 - Tuned the system using unigram word and silent state probabilities to achieve a word error rate (WER) of 0.4 
 -  Implemented pruning (to weed out low probability hypotheses), tree structured lexicons, and bigram probabilities to further lower WER

projects.title: Music Trends through Spotify
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented an app using Spotify’s API and MongoDB
 - Analyzed current music trends through music attributes from popular charting songs (and playlists like Billboard’s Top 100) to predict future ones 
 - Stored data in MongoDB database

projects.title: Computer Graphics Bot Video Game
projects.bodyText:
- Utilized ray tracing, intersection, shading, filtering, texture mapping, particle system manipulation, and cubic Bezier splines to implement a three-dimensional terrain scape where a user is attacked by converging bots 
 -  The user can move, change perspective, shoot particles, and if contact is detected between the user and the bots, their health goes down incrementally
